name: The Pirate Bay - No Ads (June 2013)
additional_info:
/* +++ changelog +++
June 19th, 2013
- Hides "Your browser does not support direct torrents downloads" "Install Plug-in"
May 3rd, 2013
- they changed their domain to .sx
Nov 10th, 2012
- Hides "Problems with magnets links are fixed by upgrading your torrent client" Adware Link
Oct 6th, 2012
- Hides "Anonymous Download" links Again
September 16th, 2012
- Hides "Anonymous Download" links
April 15th, 2012
- fixed "Hides NoScript Place Holder Icons"
April 5th, 2012
- they changed their domain to .se
June 18th, 2011
- Hides Sponsored Links
April 13th, 2011
- Hides "WATCH ONLINE FOR FREE ON TUBE+"
November 16th, 2010
- Hides Yet Another Toolbar Ad
October 28th, 2010
 - Hides NoScript Place Holder Icons
 - Hides Another Toolbar Ad
October 24th, 2010
 - Hides Toolbar Ad On 404 Pages
September 21st, 2010
 - Hides cltomedia.info ads - Wow PirateBay still hacked.. "This web page at cltomedia.info has been reported as an attack page and has been blocked based on your security preferences."
August 23th, 2010
 - Hides Right Side Bar Ad On User Pages
August 20th, 2010
 - seems I missed a few
August 20th, 2010
 - original release
